title: Bangladesh tour postponed, Australia gear up for Kiwis
text: Bangladesh tour postponed, Australia gear up for Kiwis Friday, 2 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) The likes of Steve Smith and Glenn Maxwell will participate in the domestic ODI tournament in the meantime. *Australias two-Test tour to Bangladesh remained on hold today with players returning to their home states after new warnings about security in the south Asian... Deccan Herald 2 days ago - Sports Also reported by • guardian.co.uk guardian.co.uk 2 days ago - Sports Also reported by • New Zealand Herald • DNA • newKerala.com • Telegraph.co.uk You Might Like Other recent news in Sports Comments Twitter Green Shirts As Australia postponed its Bangladesh Tour, So some doubts created for Next Year U-19 WC which scheduled in Bangladesh too. 1 minute ago FOX SPORTS Cricket Test career over without a ball bowled? http://t.co/gSB7LUrQPj #cricket 2 minutes ago allsportsfix RT @FOXCricketLive : Smith bitterly disappointed over canned tour http://t.co/f5KQujVBGw #cricket 3 minutes ago Ravi Kumar RT @IExpressSports : #Bangladesh tour postponed, #Australia gear up for Kiwis READ http://t.co/7jTemBH6hP http://t.co/bcwUC9asEN 16 minutes ago TCS Zimbabwe The decision to postpone Australia's tour of Bangladesh is not without precedent: http://t.co/vbzpIGZQBY #BANvAUS … http://t.co/6L7ejqgC7s 22 minutes ago We Are Kent Test career over without a ball bowled? http://t.co/cBtKDBEMCx 23 minutes ago
